content: little bunny boohoo by gnathalie2 materials size g hook size f hook ww yarn for the head body arms and legs i used red heart pink camo yarn for the ears i used red heart in a light brown color for the eyes/mouth i used caron simply soft in black and turquoise fiberfill yarn needle glue use size f hook for mouth and eyes use g hook for everything else head 6 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 12sc rd2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18sc rd3 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24sc rd4 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 30sc rd5-10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30sc rd11 decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 24sc rd12 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18sc rd13 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12sc fasten_off leave long tail for sewing body 6 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 12sc rd2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18sc rd3-11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18sc rd12 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12sc rd13 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12sc fasten_off arms make 2 5 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 10sc rd2&3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10sc rd4 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 times single_crochet in next single_crochet 7sc rd5-12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 7sc fasten_off legs make 2 6 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 12sc rd2&3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12sc rd4 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 8 single_crochet rd5-13 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8sc fasten_off ears make 2 with light brown ww yarn 6 single_crochet in a ring rd1 2sc in each single_crochet around 12sc rd2 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 18sc rd3 2sc in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24sc rd4-9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24sc rd10 decrease single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18sc rd11 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18sc rd12 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12sc rd13-20 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12sc rd21 decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet around 8sc rd22 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8sc fasten_off eyes make 2 with black yarn and g hook 5 single_crochet in a ring insert hook into first single_crochet switch yarn to blue pull through slip_stitch chain 4 slip_stitch in same space chain 3 slip_stitch in next single_crochet around fasten_off nose/mouth chain 4 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next fasten_off cut both tails evenly and short finishing/notes stuff legs and arms sew legs onto bottom of body sew arms at the very top of body do not stuff ears sew to the back/top of the head stuff head and sew to top of the body here you re gonna sew through the body and the arms sew or glue eyes to the face glue
